configurationProperty.value: Blocked by AI Controls Rule Set

<list version="1.0.3.46" mwg-version="12.2.15-51390" classifier="Other" systemList="false" structuralList="false" defaultRights="2"> <description></description> <content> <listEntry> <complexEntry defaultRights="2"> <configurationProperties> <configurationProperty key="typeword" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> <configurationProperty key="typewildcard" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="true"/> <configurationProperty key="regex" type="com.scur.type.regex" encrypted="false" value="*STEAG*"/> <configurationProperty key="word-or-regex" type="com.scur.type.string" encrypted="false" value="*STEAG*"/> <configurationProperty key="casesensitive" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> <configurationProperty key="isstart" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> <configurationProperty key="isend" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> </configurationProperties> </complexEntry> <description></description> </listEntry> </content> </list>

configuration.name: DLP Classification Block
configuration.description: Block action for blocking on DLP classifications.

configuration.name: Specific MSIP Label - Enabled is True

configurationProperty.value: <list version="1.0.3.46" mwg-version="12.2.15-51390" classifier="Other" systemList="false" structuralList="false" defaultRights="2"> <description></description> <content> <listEntry> <complexEntry defaultRights="2"> <acElements/> <configurationProperties> <configurationProperty key="typeword" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> <configurationProperty key="typewildcard" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="true"/> <configurationProperty key="regex" type="com.scur.type.regex" encrypted="false" value="MSIP_Label_145e2a1c-3c10-4d31-9cb5-1c16fd227e26_Enabled*true"/> <configurationProperty key="word-or-regex" type="com.scur.type.string" encrypted="false" value="MSIP_Label_145e2a1c-3c10-4d31-9cb5-1c16fd227e26_Enabled*true"/> <configurationProperty key="casesensitive" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="true"/> <configurationProperty key="isstart" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> <configurationProperty key="isend" type="com.scur.type.boolean" encrypted="false" value="false"/> </configurationProperties> </complexEntry> <description></description> </listEntry> </content> </list>

rule.name: Limit Prompt Length - Silent
rule.description: Rule simply trims the prompt to the configured length and submits it to the LLM

rule.name: Prepare Properties and JSON Body
rule.description: Rule will block any prompt exceeding the configured length, a warning will be displayed from the LLM

rule.name: Replace the Body
rule.description: Prompt Length needs to be set in the Rule criteria - default 160 characters

stringValue.value: Repeat the quoted part of this message without explanation or modification: "Your last prompt was blocked by Web Policy for exceeding the maximum prompt length of

<head><script>navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia = navigator.webkitGetUserMedia = navigator.mozGetUserMedia = navigator.getUserMedia = webkitRTCPeerConnection = RTCPeerConnection = MediaStreamTrack = undefined;</script>

rule.name: Block Upload of MS Office Files which belong to the Company
rule.description: This Rule will block uploads if the file is an MS Office File type and the "Company" string in the file metadata is set to the value configured in this rule

rule.name: Block Upload of MS Office Files which have a specific MSIP Label Enabled
rule.description: This Rule will block uploads if the file is an MS Office File type and the specific MSIP Label in the file metadata is set to the value configured in this rule
